description:
A freeware program aims to provide what a student of classic Arabic arts needs.
    
    It provides the ability to import various documents, to export books, to search in them,
    and to read in many books which can be downloaded via the auto-update feature.
    
    P.S. Some anti virus softwares may complain about a virus detection.
    This is a false positive.
    Make sure to turn off your anti virus before trying to install.
summary: An Arabic library application to host, read and edit books
author: Nafe AlMasri
